summary: Backend-only testing of the free-space gain model and boom doubling behavior. All 20 tests passed. The lookup-table based gain model returns expected values: 2elem=6.2, 3elem=8.2, 5elem=10.8, 8elem=13.0, 10elem=14.0 dBi. Boom doubling gives +2.5dB, halving gives -2.5dB. No-reflector mode correctly applies -1.5dB adjustment.
seed_data_creation: None - Uses public API endpoints without authentication
context_for_next_testing_agent: Free-space gain model fully verified. All tests pass.
